entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h this morning then light late this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Friday 7 April 2023
